backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing card management, user profiles, authorization mixins, and storage, including types and mutations for adding and retrieving user-owned cards.
backend/migration.mo: Defines legacy data structures and a no-op migration that returns existing card maps unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing performance-related frontend changes, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten short summaries describing each frontend file’s functionality and recent enhancements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, actor initialization, profile loading, error states, and main tab-based navigation.
frontend/src/components/AddCardDialog.ts: Modal form for creating a new card, handling state, suggestions, validation, and submission via useAddCard.
frontend/src/components/AutocompleteText: Text input with dropdown autocomplete that filters suggestions and handles clicks outside to close.
frontend/src/components/CardItem.tsx: Displays a card with rarity styling, pricing info, and edit/sell/delete actions using dialogs.
frontend/src/components/CraftedCardsModa: Modal showing crafted cards with rarity badges, purchase details, and card metadata loaded from useGetCraftedCards.
frontend/src/components/EditCardDialog.t: Modal form for editing an existing card, preloading its fields and submitting updates via useUpdateCard.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays a styled error alert with technical details and a reload option.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with attribution and external link styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component handling Internet Identity login/logout and displaying user greeting.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting user to enter and save their profile name via mutation.
frontend/src/components/SellOrTradeDialo: Dialog for selling or trading a card with UI for pricing, rarity styles, and new card data inputs.
frontend/src/components/SoldCardsModal.t: Modal showing sold and traded cards with profit/loss calculations and expandable trade groups.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the backend actor based on identity and invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Hook exposing query state for actor initialization and providing retry handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoogleAuth.ts: Empty placeholder file for Google Auth hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profile, cards, and transaction-related backend operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global border and body styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/CardsPage.tsx: Displays the user's cards with search and multi‑filter functionality and supports adding new cards via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Builds portfolio metrics from snapshot data, including investments, balances, and transaction counts, and shows modals for sold and crafted cards.
frontend/src/utils/cardSuggestions.ts: Provides helper functions to extract unique card attributes and filter suggestion lists.
frontend/src/utils/redactSecrets.ts: Redacts sensitive data in strings and errors, replacing tokens and secrets with placeholders.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including sessionStorage integration and hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, animations, and plugins using CSS variables for theming.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, known performance issues, and a list of existing performance‑related feature items for the Sorare Portfolio project.
